description: NetBeans modules can be used for creating various types of plugins for the software. For example, JasperSoft's iReport module is a popular module for programmatically designing and generating graphical reports. Another popular plugin called jVi provides the functionality of the Vi text editor in NetBeans.
NetBeans is often used for developing Java programs, but it also supports other languages, such as PHP, C++, Python, Ruby, and Groovy.
